scripts.test: npm -w shared test && npm -w agent test && npm -w issuer test && npm -w verifier-rs test
scripts.dev:issuer: npm -w issuer run build && node issuer/dist/server.js
scripts.dev:verifier: npm -w verifier-rs run build && node verifier-rs/dist/server.js
scripts.demo: npm -w shared run build && npm -w issuer run build && npm -w verifier-rs run build && node scripts/full-demo.mjs
